details.text: The xhtml node at 'Text without container' does not have a class attribute to indicate it's source (boilerplate, generated, or original) and this is required by the profile StructureDefinition[http://hl7.org.au/fhir/test/StructureDefinition/xhtml-ctrol-source-profile]

The xhtml node at 'More text without a source' does not have a class attribute to indicate it's source (boilerplate, generated, or original) and this is required by the profile StructureDefinition[http://hl7.org.au/fhir/test/StructureDefinition/xhtml-ctrol-source-profile]
